allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor access control and add configurable eligibility criteria

- Separate role-based access control from eligibility evaluation
- AccessControl now handles role-action permissions (View, Update, Delete, Download)
- Eligibility criteria moved to template_config column
- Add TemplateConfig model with eligibility_criteria support
- Add RoleAccess model for role-action mapping
- Update RuleEvaluationService to read from TemplateConfig
- Add fallback to resolve extracted fields from request context
- Add comprehensive unit tests (23 tests, 10 scenarios)
- Document data_extraction_config and eligibility_criteria integration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix API response issues and add test scripts

- Add lineOfBusiness mapping from template to response
- Add accessible_flag filter to all repository queries
- Fix Postman pagination fields (pageNumber/pageSize)
- Update data.sql with PostgreSQL compatibility fixes
- Remove old Postman collection from root
- Add test scripts for API and database verification
